member.name: P:OpenTelemetry.Instrumentation.Http.HttpClientInstrumentationOptions.FilterHttpRequestMessage
member.summary: Gets or sets a filter function that determines whether or not to collect telemetry on a per request basis.
member.remarks:
FilterHttpRequestMessage is only executed on .NET and .NET Core runtimes. and on .NET and .NET Core are both implemented using . Notes:
The return value for the filter function is interpreted as:
If filter returns , the request is collected.
If filter returns or throws an exception the request is NOT collected.

member.name: P:OpenTelemetry.Instrumentation.Http.HttpClientInstrumentationOptions.EnrichWithHttpRequestMessage
member.summary: Gets or sets an action to enrich an with .

para.b: EnrichWithHttpRequestMessage is only executed on .NET and .NET Core runtimes. and on .NET and .NET Core are both implemented using .

para.b: EnrichWithHttpResponseMessage is only executed on .NET and .NET Core runtimes. and on .NET and .NET Core are both implemented using .

member.name: P:OpenTelemetry.Instrumentation.Http.HttpClientInstrumentationOptions.EnrichWithException
member.summary: Gets or sets an action to enrich an with .

para.b: EnrichWithException is called for all runtimes.

member.name: P:OpenTelemetry.Instrumentation.Http.HttpClientInstrumentationOptions.FilterHttpWebRequest
member.summary: Gets or sets a filter function that determines whether or not to collect telemetry on a per request basis.
member.remarks:
FilterHttpWebRequest is only executed on .NET Framework runtimes. and on .NET Framework are both implemented using . Notes:
The return value for the filter function is interpreted as:
If filter returns , the request is collected.
If filter returns or throws an exception the request is NOT collected.

member.name: T:OpenTelemetry.Internal.HttpSemanticConventionHelper
member.summary: Helper class for Http Semantic Conventions.
member.remarks: Due to a breaking change in the semantic convention, affected instrumentation libraries must inspect an environment variable to determine which attributes to emit. This is expected to be removed when the instrumentation libraries reach Stable. .

member.name: F:OpenTelemetry.Internal.HttpSemanticConventionHelper.HttpSemanticConvention.Old
member.summary: Instructs an instrumentation library to emit the old experimental HTTP attributes.

member.name: F:OpenTelemetry.Internal.HttpSemanticConventionHelper.HttpSemanticConvention.New
member.summary: Instructs an instrumentation library to emit the new, v1.21.0 Http attributes.

member.name: F:OpenTelemetry.Internal.HttpSemanticConventionHelper.HttpSemanticConvention.Dupe
member.summary: Instructs an instrumentation library to emit both the old and new attributes.
